class.name: MediaPipeGraphNode
class.description: [MediaPipeGraphNode] represents a calculator node created by [MediaPipeGraphBuilder]. The node should only be used with [MediaPipeGraphBuilder] that creates it, and other nodes created by the same builder.

method.name: get_input_index
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeDestination] of the node by [param index].

method.name: get_input_tag
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeDestination] of the node by [param tag].

method.name: get_options
method.description: Gets the options proto of the node.

method.name: get_output_index
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeSource] of the node by [param index].

method.name: get_output_tag
method.description: Gets the [MediaPipeNodeSource] of the node by [param tag].

method.name: set_options
method.description: Sets the options proto of the node.
